title: Divine Lotus Chandbali Jhumka with Polki Diamonds, Ruby, Coral, and Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Kundan Setting and Polish.
features: Exquisite Chandbali design featuring a Lotus motif (Kamalam) at the top, adorned with vibrant Burmese Rubies and a central Polki Diamond. A second Polki-encrusted design cascades into a Jhumka bell shape. The Jhumka is decorated with Coral beads, freshwater pearls and Polki Diamonds, arranged in a captivating cascading waterfall of rice-like pearls (biwa pearls) and coral fringe. The piece is handcrafted with traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting techniques, showcasing exceptional detail and a rich, antique-inspired aesthetic.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a regal statement. Ideal for traditional Telugu/South Indian attire
description: A true masterpiece of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. This Chandbali Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional design elements with high-quality materials. The Lotus motif symbolizes purity and enlightenment, adding a spiritual dimension. The intricate Kundan setting and antique polish showcase the skill of master artisans. Polki Diamonds, known for their unique sparkle and heritage value, make this a heirloom-worthy piece. The combination of Ruby, Coral and Pearls is considered auspicious and aesthetically striking.
